select * from iam_role r
AND r.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleQuery.name}), '%')
AND r.code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleQuery.code}), '%')
AND r.resource_level LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleQuery.level}), '%')
AND r.is_enabled = #{roleQuery.enabled}
AND r.is_built_in = #{roleQuery.builtIn}
AND ( r.name LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleQuery.param}), '%') OR r.code LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleQuery.param}), '%') OR r.resource_level LIKE concat(concat('%',#{roleQuery.param}), '%') )

select ir.id,ir.code,irt.name,ir.description from iam_member_role imr left join iam_role ir on (imr.role_id = ir.id) left join iam_role_tl irt on (ir.id = irt.id and irt.lang = #{__current_lang}) where ir.is_enabled = 1 and imr.member_id = #{memberId} and imr.member_type = #{memberType}

select ir.id, ir.code, irt.name, ir.description, ir.is_enabled from iam_role ir left outer join iam_role_tl irt on ( ir.id = irt.id and irt.lang = #{__current_lang}) where ir.is_enabled = 1
and ir.id = #{id}
and ir.code like concat('%',concat(#{code},'%'))
and irt.name like concat('%',concat(#{name},'%'))
order by ir.id asc

select ir.id, ir.code, irt.name, ir.description, ir.is_enabled from iam_role ir left join iam_role_tl irt on ( ir.id = irt.id and irt.lang = #{__current_lang}) where ir.is_enabled = 1
and ir.id not in ( select imr.role_id from iam_member_role imr where imr.member_id = #{userId,jdbcType=DECIMAL,javaType=java.lang.Long} and imr.member_type = 'user' )
and ir.code like concat('%',concat(#{code},'%'))
and irt.name like concat('%',concat(#{name},'%'))
order by ir.id asc

select ir.id,ir.code,irt.name,ir.description,imr.id as member_role_Id from iam_member_role imr left join iam_role ir on (imr.role_id = ir.id) left join iam_role_tl irt on (ir.id = irt.id and irt.lang = #{__current_lang}) where imr.member_id = #{userId} and imr.member_type = 'user'

SELECT ir.*, ip.id permission_id, ip.code permission_code, ip.path, ip.method, ip.resource_level AS permission_level, ip.action, ip.controller, ip.is_public_access, ip.is_login_access, ip.service_code, ip.description AS permission_description FROM iam_role ir LEFT JOIN iam_role_permission irp ON ir.id = irp.role_id LEFT JOIN iam_permission ip ON irp.permission_id = ip.id WHERE ir.id = #{id}
